user_question: What are the health benefits of drinking coffee, and can you generate an image of a futuristic coffee shop?
final_answer: Coffee has several health benefits, including improved energy levels, enhanced brain function, and a lower risk of several diseases. Image of a futuristic coffee shop generated. Coffee production can lead to deforestation, water pollution, and biodiversity loss, but sustainable practices can mitigate these impacts.
